item.title: Several days of litter, 28th August
item.description:
At the top of pages walk area where there is a walled area and plants has not had litter cleared for nearly a week. I have watch it get more and more littered over the last few day.

item.title: Trees outside 14-16 & 18-20 overgrown and root affecting pavement, 28th August
item.description:
Trees outside 14-16 & 18-20 are becoming overgrown and fruit is falling on pavements and driveways cause a slippery mess. Also the tree roots are affecting the pavement by causing it to be uneven
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Heath Road, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress, old sofa, building waste dumped for over 3 months, 28th August
item.description:
Please remove this is right outside my home and is disgusting. Waste has been dumped for over 3 months and people keep adding more :(

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Downham Way, Downham, London

item.title: Road signs have been turned so as not to be visible, 28th August

item.title: Litter and overgrown grass in estate garden on pembury estate, 28th August
item.description:
The communal garden area in the estate has not been maintained for some time. The grass is very overgrown and there is litter scattered around making it unpleasant for residents. It needs cutting and grass cutting.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pembury Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light at side of No 41 Little Bornes, SE21 is on 24 hours a day., 28th August
item.description:
For 6 months or more street light at the side of No 41 Little Bornes, SE21 never switches off. This is a waste of electricity and the light itself will wear out prematurely if not corrected.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Little Bornes, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street sign needs replacing, 28th August
item.description:
Hello, I reported this problem about 18 months ago but no action has been taken yet. The street sign on Trafalgar Street has completely faded on one side. Could you replace it please? Itâ€™s the sign on the corner of Trafalgar and Dawes. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 194,196,198, Trafalgar Street, Walworth, London
